name: TGF: The Great Fleece
description:
HISTORY:

You are Darren, you are infiltrated in a Bank, and you want to get into the vault... how would you do it?

Your fellow mate Oliver talks to you with tips to overcome the difficulties.

CONTROLS:

Left mouse button to move

Right mouse button to toss coin

CREDITS:

This game was made as a learning project.

THANKS to: Jonathan and Carlos for this great course who they made.

In Spanish:

https://www.udemy.com/la-guia-definitiva-para-la-cinematografia-con-unity

In English:

https://www.udemy.com/theultimate-guide-to-cinematography-with-unity/Author: Yone Moreno Jimenez
